title: Whole Foods Markets, Inc. Recalls Products Due to Misbranding and an Undeclared Allergen
summary: WASHINGTON, Feb. 10, 2015 Whole Foods Markets, Inc. is recalling approximately 33,191 pounds of ready to eat products due to misbranding and an undeclared allergen, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced today. The product contains peanut, a known allergen...
